item.title: House Oversight Committee says it has Epstein's 'birthday book'
item.description: The committee issued a subpoena in late August for information from the estate.

item.title: 'Heartbroken': Woman stabbed to death while riding light rail train
item.description: Video of the attack was recently released of the attack on the light rail in Charlotte.

item.title: WATCH: Ukrainian woman stabbed to death on train in North Carolina
item.description: North Carolina Gov. Josh Stein said Monday he was "appalled" by the unprovoked murder of a Ukrainian woman on Charlotte's light rail system last month...

item.title: WATCH: Chicago bracing for possible federal intervention
item.description: President Trump has repeatedly said he's considering sending federal troops to Chicago, while local officials have maintained any deployment would be ...

item.title: WATCH: Russia launches 142 drones into Ukraine
item.description: At least three people are dead, including a child, after Russia struck Ukraine overnight.
